title: Bug 17893Editor reuse threshold does not disable properly when defaults restored
description: Build 20020521 go to Workbench prefs if Close Editors Automatically is selected, deselect it Note that the label and field for "Number of opened editors before closing"are disabled select Close Editors Automatically change Number of opened editors before closing to 4 Restore Defaults Close Editors is deselected but "Number of opened editors before closing" isnot disabledTo fix this properly requires adding setEnabled(boolean) to the field editors.
